text: Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for content creation and gaming. The NVIDIA RTX 2080 in the MSI GT Series GT76 TITAN DT-039 17.3" 4K/UHD IPS Intel Core i9 9th Gen 9900K (3.60 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2080 64 GB Memory 1 TB SSD 1 TB HDD Windows 10 Pro 64-bit Gaming Laptop is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Call of Duty: Warzone and Fortnite. The build quality of the MSI GT Series GT76 TITAN DT-039 17.3" 4K/UHD IPS Intel Core i9 9th Gen 9900K (3.60 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2080 64 GB Memory 1 TB SSD 1 TB HDD Windows 10 Pro 64-bit Gaming Laptop is solid, and the trackpad is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Cyberpunk 2077 and Fortnite. A definite 5 stars!

A definite 5 stars!
